<xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="damage_boost">damage_boost</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="58" y="41"><field name="trigger">player_ticks</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="itemstack_has_enchantment"><field name="enhancement">CUSTOM:LifeAura</field><value name="item"><block type="entity_get_armor_slot_item"><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GTE</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_health"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="entity_health_max"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:damage_boost</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">boost is 2 at full health</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_add_achievement"><field name="achievement">CUSTOM:LifeAuraAdv</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></next></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:damage_boost</field><comment pinned="false" h="123" w="435">uses formula floor(3x - 1) for damage boost where
x = fraction of remaining health

boost is 1 at > 2/3 health
boost is 0 at 1/3 to 2/3 health
boost is -1 when less than 1/3 health</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MINUS</field><value name="A"><block type="math_singular_ops"><field
